talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Because of the size of the vibration, there's a wide range of areas to look at. While we're checking the nightmare, why don't you examine the Silver Dragon's Forcefield?

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Of course, our Dragon must be keeping an eye on the place, but we need to determine the cause. If there's something as strange as before, we might need your power.

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Thank you. Take care!
<html>$Unexpected Encounter$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Trouble? That's not it! Anyway, what the heck is going on here?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud${action:Angry}
(Velskud looks incredibly angry.)
Tell me! What trouble did you make this time?!

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>How could I not see it? A massive new road sprang up out of nowhere!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You came here without even knowing what happened?
(He seems to clench his teeth as if biting his tongue.)
It was a huge vibration that shook the whole barrier, and you didn't feel it?
At least you recognize that the place has changed.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Rearranged… Is that what happened in <FONT color=#086171>Saint Haven</FONT>?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Yeah, exactly. Space has been totally rearranged.

$Velskud$
Of course there have been changes there too. Isn't that why you came to see me?

${user_nick}$
(You tell Velskud what Priestess of Darkness Shea said and about the changes in Saint Haven.)
The king and I are the only ones who recognize the situation.

$Velskud$
I'm not surprised. That's how humans are.
The things that surround them have changed completely, yet they don't even see it. They carry on as calmly as fish in a fishbowl.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But why has this happened in <FONT color=#086171>Saint Haven</FONT> specifically?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Think of the underlying principles of this world, fool.
Lagendia can change at any time according to the Goddess's dreams.
This time the change was so enormous that the entirety of space is shaking in the aftereffects.
Because the whole dream moved.

$Velskud$
… You still don't know what's inSaint Haven?

$Velskud$
(Glares at you coldly)

$Velskud$
Yes. TheGarden of Time and Space is a place for collecting and monitoring the Goddess's nightmares. Of course, the place is greatly influenced by dreams.

$Velskud$
I'm sure you remember what the collapse was about.

${user_nick}$
Because Labynia haphazardly fashioned and separated the fabric of space... The Goddess's nightmares are being created randomly?

$Velskud$
You've finally found a use for that tiny head of yours.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No way, that's why this place has changed, too?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
The Garden of Time and Space, the Labyrinth, the Storm of Time and Space… Think about it.
You humans think this place is safe, but Saint Haven is on the front line of the nightmare.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>There's nothing wrong with the barrier though, right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Yeah. It's the same problem. Even if the barrier blocks the nightmare's energy from flowing into the open Monolith, the change in dreams is bound to appear most intensely here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh, not at all! But with that amount of vibration... The Goddess is not going to wake up, right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
… How dare you doubt my ability? You've become quite brave.

$Velskud$
Why, are you afraid?

${user_nick}$
It's obvious! Don't we need the Cup of Healing to wake up the Goddess? Hold on… But if the Goddess wakes up, does what Feder said before come true? Our entire world will disappear! What the heck do we do?
(I can't calm down!)

$Velskud$
Stop making a fuss. I'm having enough trouble thinking about Labynia... Wait, what is that?

${user_nick}$
(All of a sudden, a whirlwind envelops your body.)
... Huh? What? What is this?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(</FONT><FONT color=#a82424>Velskud </FONT><FONT color=#7e12d2>reaches out his hand.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_q3844_01.ogg}
Who is this kid?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(It's </FONT><FONT color=#a82424>Argenta</FONT><FONT color=#7e12d2></FONT><FONT color=#7e12d2>! It's definitely </FONT><FONT color=#a82424>Argenta</FONT><FONT color=#7e12d2></FONT><FONT color=#7e12d2>, but she doesn't recognize me!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_q3844_02.ogg}
What are you doing here, kid? That blank stare tells me you still haven't woken up yet. Quit hanging around here and go home.

${user_nick}$
(Wait… This is the Cristal Stream? I guess I've traveled through time like I did once before. But I never thought I'd see Argenta again. What should I say?)
Well… I mean…

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_q3844_03.ogg}
I told you it's dangerous here. Don't you understand me?
I guess with that tiny weapon of yours you think you're invincible. Go back.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Argenta, please listen to me. It's important!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_q3844_04.ogg}
… You know my name? Who are you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>… What? A dream... within a dream?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_q3844_05.ogg}
You… I see. I can feel the energy from you. Are you caught up in the flow of time and space? There is no end to the problems caused by that Monolith, honestly. Listen kid... How did you get into this dream within a dream?

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_q3844_06.ogg}
The Goddess's dream within a dream, the deepest of all dreams. Think of it as a shadow of the past. It's a surprise to see a human being getting caught up this deep. Well, you won't last long anyway. But I wouldn't want to see you die, so take my hand.
(Argenta reaches out her hand as if she's annoyed.)

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_q3844_07.ogg}
Be quiet! Oh...? Is that a jewel in your body? And a Red Dragon's jewel, no less?! Who are you, really?!

$Argenta$
Tell me. What has happened to you?

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Archer Triana${action:Talk}
Fancy seeing you again here. How do you do, {user_class} {user_nick} ?

${user_nick}$
Triana! You're here too. This is Saint Haven, right? But… It feels like I've gone back to the past!

$Archer Triana${sound:npc_arc_q3847_01.ogg}
Right, this is the Old Saint Haven... But we're the only ones here.

${user_nick}$
Right. There's you, me… and Angelica. It's weird. If we're in the past, we should be able to see the people who were here before.
(Is this really a dream within a dream like Argenta said?)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What do you mean stopped? Don't tell me... We're not stuck here, are we?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Archer Triana$
I was wondering about that, too. Even the air here... Everything seems to have stopped.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Oh, I was caught up in a whirlwind, too!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Archer Triana${sound:npc_arc_q3847_02.ogg}
Well, I don't know how to get out of here. Maybe we have to wait for another whirlwind...

${user_nick}$
You encountered a whirlwind, too, Triana? So... were you at the Silver Dragon's Forcefield by any chance?

$Archer Triana$
Yeah, I got caught up in a whirlwind on my way there. When I woke up, I found myself here, in this place.

${user_nick}$
Then… (heart racing) Have you noticed that Saint Haven... has changed?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(I wasn't the only one who saw it!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Archer Triana${action:Talk}
So you also recognized it, {user_nick}. You're right, Saint Haven has changed. I'm glad there's someone else who noticed it. But...

$Archer Triana${sound:npc_arc_q3847_03.ogg}
The people of Saint Haven have no idea what's going on. Why are we the only ones who remember?

${user_nick}$
Right... I don't know why, but I'm glad we both remember how things were, that I'm not alone at least.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That's right, and we have to get out of here. We can't get trapped!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Archer Triana$
(Triana looks a little surprised, then shows a gentle smile.)
Right. I think we can overcome whatever happens because we're together.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(After the conversation, </FONT><FONT color=#a82424>Triana</FONT><FONT color=#7e12d2> becomes lost in thought. You should go see </FONT><FONT color=#a82424>Angelica</FONT><FONT color=#7e12d2>.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Archer Triana$
When you say it with such determination, I realize we can do it, {user_nick}. Thank you.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Argenta$
Come on. What are you waiting for?

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Angelica? That's right. We all ended up here.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorceress Angelica${sound:npc_soc_q3850_01.ogg}{action:Talk}
Why did Saint Haven revert to its past form? Are we back in time?
Oh! {user_class} {user_nick} ! You were dragged here, too?

$Sorceress Angelica$
Well, by any chance were you at the Silver Dragon's Forcefield too? Is this where you ended from there?

${user_nick}$
Yes! That's right. I met Argenta on the way though… According to Triana, we'll have to wait for the Goddess to let us out.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Argenta told me this is the Goddess's <FONT color=#a82424>dream within a dream</FONT>… </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorceress Angelica$
What? Argenta? What are you talking about? Tell me more. You... met Argenta? At what point in the past? Oh, come on, tell me!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Um... Well... I'm not sure about that…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorceress Angelica${sound:npc_soc_q3850_02.ogg}
Why are the Goddesses so capricious? Everything is about their dreams! Their will! What, do we have to wait here forever on their whims?
(Angelica is furious.)

$Sorceress Angelica${sound:npc_soc_q3850_03.ogg}
Why the heck are we here? Seriously, why are 'we' here? Think about it: not just you and me, but Triana and Edan are here too.
Considering what we've been through, this can't be a coincidence. Right?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Angelica seems to be pondering something. Go speak with Edan for now.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorceress Angelica$
Do you think the Goddess has gathered us? 'A chosen warrior...' That suits a genius like me.

$Archer Triana${action:Talk}
How do we get out of here...?

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Cleric Edan${action:Talk}
{user_nick}. This is a bit of an awkward situation to say 'Hello, nice to see you.'

${user_nick}$
Right. Triana and Angelica are both here too. Angelica said this can't be a coincidence.

$Cleric Edan${sound:npc_cl_q3853_02.ogg}
Well, it seems like the Goddess's dream has changed. Maybe that's why we're here.

${user_nick}$
That's exactly what Velskud said! Not only that, we were all caught up in a whirlwind in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield. I… met Argenta there. Edan, have you encountered anyone?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Did Edan meet </FONT><FONT color=#a82424>Argenta</FONT><FONT color=#7e12d2> too?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Edan${action:Talk}
Yes, it's... it's called a dream within a dream. They say only a few people have returned safely from this place.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Ugh... I'm scared. Edan, how can you be so calm?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Edan$
But as long as we're together, I'm sure we can find a way back.

$Cleric Edan${sound:npc_cl_q3853_01.ogg}
(Edan begins to explain calmly.)
You know, the Goddess's dream fragments are scattered throughout time and space. Could this be a part of one?

$Cleric Edan$
Then the Goddess's power must be influencing this place. Think about it. Has she ever tried to hurt us?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What do you mean? Is there something worse than this?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Edan$
So we don't have to worry too much. Something similar happened in the Monolith before, but we were able to come back safely. Actually, there's something else entirely that worries me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Come to think of it, he's not here.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Edan${sound:npc_cl_q3853_03.ogg}
I'm concerned about the safety and security of Saint Haven and the royal family. His Majesty had noticed something was amiss.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(You think carefully about what Edan said.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Edan${action:Talk}
Exactly. We have to question that. Why do you think we were the only ones sent here?

${user_nick}$
(Indeed, of all people, we're the only ones here. Argenta said we wouldn't last here long, but... Somehow, I feel safer here, and I think there's a reason.)

${user_nick}$
(This time it's different from Mobius. I feel like I'm where I should be, where I should have come. And I even feel warm and cozy.)

$Archer Triana${action:Talk}
How do we get out of here...?

$Sorceress Angelica${action:Talk}
Do you think the Goddess has gathered us? 'A chosen warrior...' That suits a genius like me.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

$Velskud$
You troublemaker! What are you doing here!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Look, we didn't come here because we wanted to!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Quiet! You're lucky your very existence hasn't been eradicated, coming all the way here. You fools, go back to where you came from!

$Velskud$
(Velskud glares in your direction with terrifying eyes. It would be beneficial for your health not to say anything right now.)
Do you know where you are right now? You're in a dream within a dream. I couldn't hold onto you before, so you were swept all the way here!

$Velskud$
I thought you were an okay kid, but I guess I was mistaken. It must have been hard for that woman to clean up your messes all the time.
(His mouth snaps shut and he seems to be holding back his anger.)
Here, hold on tight.

$Velskud$
Unless you want to spend a thousand years here, grab my hand. You'll have to keep your wits about you to avoid being swept away.

$Velskud$
You must want to stay here for a thousand years. I won't stop you.

※You cannot proceed in a party.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Ugh... This is... </FONT><FONT color=#086171>the Silver Dragon's Forcefield</FONT><FONT color=#7e12d2>...)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
...
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

$Velskud$
...

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅰ
journal.contents:
Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

It's true that a huge transformation has occurred, but you don't know why, or how it has affected the rest of the world. Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield and find out what's going on.

Silver Dragon's Forcefield-Velskud
journal.todo_msg: Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅱ
journal.contents:
Talk toArgenta.
After falling into the cracks created by the distortions in Time and Space, you see her right in front of you. Talk to Argenta.

Cristal Stream-Argenta

※To meet Argenta, you must go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅲ
journal.contents:
Speak with Archer Triana.
You were swept up by another whirlwind before you could have a proper conversation with Argenta. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Archer Riana

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅳ
journal.contents:
Speak with Sorceress Angelica.
You were swept up by another whirlwind before you could have a proper conversation with Argenta. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Sorceress Angelica

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅴ
journal.contents:
Speak with Cleric Edan.
You were swept up by another whirlwind before you could have a proper conversation with Argenta. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Cleric Edan

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅵ
journal.contents:
Speak with Velskud.
As you were speaking with the others and beginning to fall into the abyss of despair, Velskud appeared before you. Is he, like Argenta, part of the Goddess's dream within a dream that appeared for but an instance? Speak with him and find out.

Old Saint Haven-Velskud

※To get to Old Saint Haven, you must first go to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅶ
journal.contents:
Peak with Velskud.
Back at the Silver Dragon's Forcefield, Velskud is giving you a nerve-wracking stare. It seems you should go speak with him.

Silver Dragon's Forcefield-Velskud
